metadata.title: CVE-2024-50204 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fs: don't try and remove empty rbtree nodeWhen copying a namespace we won't have added the new copy into thenamespace rbtree until after the copy succeeded. Calling free_mnt_ns()will try to remove the copy from the rbtree which is invalid. Simplyfree the namespace skeleton directly.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
